title: Elf-help for Overcoming Depression
description: Elf-help Thearpy Books - Whimsical Elfin characters offer simple, sage advice for dealing with all of life's challenges! By Linus Mundy. How to look into one's own heart and soul, and to others for help. Each 4" x 6" softcover book features approx. 80 pages.
author: Linus Mundy
